description:
Protect your face with this gentle sunscreen enriched with vitamin E.

  • Broad-spectrum UVA and UVB protection
  • Water-resistant rating of 80 minutes
  • Gluten and paraben free
  • Cruelty free
  • Ingredients: avobenzone - 3.00%, homosalate - 10.00%, octisalate - 5.00%, octocrylene - 10.00%. inactive: water, butyloctyl salicylate, hydrated silica, vp/hexadecene copolymer, styrene/acrylates copolymer, dimethicone, polyester-8, tocopherol acetate, bht, glyceryl stearate, peg-100 stearate, ethylhexyl stearate, behenyl alcohol, caprylyl methicone, trimethylsiloxysilicate, dimethyl capramide, sodium polyacrylate, xanthan gum, trideceth-6, disodium edta, ethylhexylglycerin, polyaminopropyl biguanide, methylisothiazolinone
name: Sun Bum SPF 50 Face Suncreen Lotion 88ml
